name: Slaughter and Conquer
description: Slaughter and Conquer is a challenging  2d fast paced hack-and-slash game with strategy and top down shooter elements. Play as Yukan the conqueror, and conquer villages with your army; and help Yukan overcome his fear of failure. The game has fighting mechanics, shooting mechanics, army building, simple castle building mechanics, and a magic system. Each time you play slaughter and conquer you will play a different experience as the game will randomly generate enemies each with their own unique attacks and gimmicks. Slaughter and Conquer  does not have a leveling up system for enemies but rather a courage system that determines how strong your attacks are. Sometimes harder enemies will spawn on the first few levels. The game takes time to get good at; but you will get better at it eventually.
